channel.title: 2 Problems, *Slayer XP gives farming xp to* and *Close button@bank* PI
channel.description:
Ok I got 2 problems. whenever I get slayer xp it gives me farming and fishing xp to. and how do I add a close button to my bank ?
PI 317 Deception based
